customer_reviews.title: Nice finish
customer_reviews.text: What you would expect form the standard moka pot. Years ago they used to be made from thicker aluminum but the standard now has moed to thinner material. It does not affect the functionality of the pot. It comes with a replacement ring for the joint between the upper and lower chamber. It is important to let some water boil in it before you start using it for the first time so that the surface of the aluminium can create a protective oxydative layer.
